file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/win64/tbb12.dll 
	DESTINATION ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Bin/Release)
file(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/win64/tbb12.dll 
    DESTINATION ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Bin/Debug)
add_library(tbb SHARED IMPORTED)
set_property(TARGET tbb PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION tbb12.dll)
set_property(TARGET tbb PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/win64/tbb.lib)
